column4: Hello! I was just wondering, if I setup squid on my Ubuntu box which is currently my gateway/router, will my users on the network have to make any changes on their machines?
the port number of the proxy

Doodluv and magnet right now, my Ubuntu box hands out the IP to my room mates' machines, and everything is seemingly simple. Can't I just ask squid to listen to the default ports so my room mates don't have to make any changes?
I know. I was just quoting magnet earlier, just for fun. Sorry anyway.
